name: api_whois
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool retrieve_dns_entries.
Tool description: The API enables you to make fast DNS and WHOIS lookups.
API description: Fetch WHOIS data for a given IP address, host, or URL using the RapidAPI service.

ip.description: The IP address to query WHOIS information for. Defaults to '8.8.8.8'.

host.description: The host name to query WHOIS information for. Defaults to 'google.com'.

url.description: The URL to query WHOIS information for. Defaults to 'http://google.com'.
